H0.text: In the British monarchy, who succeeded Queen Anne to the throne. James Francis Edward Stuart

H1.text: In the British monarchy, who succeeded Queen Anne to the throne. Charles Stuart

H2.text: In the British monarchy, who succeeded Queen Anne to the throne. William III's brother-in-law, John William Friso

H3.text: In the British monarchy, who succeeded Queen Anne to the throne. George I

A4.text: George was proclaimed King of Great Britain and King of Ireland.

A5.text: George inherited the British throne following the deaths in 1714 of his mother, Sophia, and his second cousin Anne, Queen of Great Britain.
